channel.title: develop on Homepage Jan Baer
channel.description: Recent content in develop on Homepage Jan Baer

item.title: MDWiki rewrite
item.description: As I wrote in my previous blog entry before a while I decided to give up the domains for my personal projects and let it run as subdomains under my personal domain janbaer.de. Before a while I realized, how easy it is to host a PWA on Github as a gh-page and thanks to Github and with the help of Let’s encrypt your PWA can also run over HTTPs which gives you more security but also the ability to use ServiceWorkers.
